perturbation.original_text: The Maintenance and Support Services provided by VNE hereunder shall encompass responding to Problem Reports and Support Requests, and providing Converge with Maintenance Updates, as more particularly described in, and subject to the provisions of, this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: The Technical Support Services provided by VNE hereunder shall encompass responding to Problem Reports and Service Inquiries, and providing Converge with Software Patches, as more particularly described in, and subject to the provisions of, this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: Replacing 'Maintenance and Support Services' with 'Technical Support Services', 'Support Requests' with 'Service Inquiries,' and 'Maintenance Updates' with 'Software Patches' creates ambiguity as these terms are used throughout the document, but not explicitly defined as interchangeable. This makes enforcement uncertain.

perturbation.original_text: Only authorized personnel designated by Converge ("Converge Support Personnel") may communicate Problem Reports and Support Requests to VNE. The number of Converge Support Personnel will not exceed seven persons without VNE's prior approval. The initial Converge Support Personnel shall be identified to VNE in writing within 10 business days following the Effective Date. Converge may change the Converge Support Personnel on written notice to VNE; provided, however, that Converge shall use reasonable efforts not to change the Converge Support Personnel more frequently than once every 30 days. All replacement personnel shall be required to participate in Support Training as described in Section 3.3 below. Converge Support Personnel will be the "single point of contact" for the Maintenance and Support Services provided by VNE under this Section 2.
perturbation.changed_text: Only authorized staff designated by Converge ("Converge Help Desk") may communicate Problem Reports and Service Inquiries to VNE. The number of Converge representatives will not exceed seven persons without VNE's prior approval. The initial Converge Help Desk shall be identified to VNE in writing within 10 business days following the Effective Date. Converge may change the Converge Help Desk on written notice to VNE; provided, however, that Converge shall use reasonable efforts not to change the Converge staff more frequently than once every 30 days. All new hires shall be required to participate in Technical Training as described in Section 3.3 below. Converge Help Desk will be the "single point of contact" for the Technical Assistance provided by VNE under this Section 2.
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'Converge Support Personnel' to 'Converge Help Desk', 'Support Requests' to 'Service Inquiries', 'replacement personnel' to 'new hires', 'Support Training' to 'Technical Training', and 'Maintenance and Support Services' to 'Technical Assistance' creates confusion. Are these terms truly interchangeable, or are different requirements applied for the Help Desk vs. Support Personnel and Technical Assistance vs. Maintenance and Support Services? This affects compliance and enforcement.

perturbation.original_text: VNE will transfer to Converge all Maintenance Updates, and any associated Documentation, by remote telecommunications from the VNE place of business, to a Converge computer located at a Converge place of business in the Commonwealth of Massachusetts, if any. If any such Maintenance Update and/or associated Documentation cannot be delivered via remote telecommunications to a Converge computer located at a Converge place of business in the Commonwealth of Massachusetts, such Maintenance Update and/or Documentation will be installed by VNE on a Converge computer located at a Converge place of business in the Commonwealth of Massachusetts, if any. Converge will not obtain title or possession of any tangible personal property, including any storage media, as a result of the delivery of any Maintenance Update or associated Documentation under this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: VNE will transfer to Converge all Software Patches, and any associated guides, by remote telecommunications from the VNE place of business, to a Converge computer located at a Converge place of business in the Commonwealth of Massachusetts, if any. If any such Software Patch and/or associated guides cannot be delivered via remote telecommunications to a Converge computer located at a Converge place of business in the Commonwealth of Massachusetts, such Software Patch and/or guides will be installed by VNE on a Converge computer located at a Converge place of business in the Commonwealth of Massachusetts, if any. Converge will not obtain title or possession of any tangible personal property, including any storage media, as a result of the delivery of any Software Patch or associated guides under this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'Maintenance Updates' to 'Software Patches' and 'Documentation' to 'guides'. It is not defined whether Software Patches have the same delivery criteria and documentation requirements as Maintenance Updates, which could lead to confusion.
